API_Description: Gets an array of `Link` objects that are enclosed within specified coordinates on a page. See also addLink and removeLinks .

nPage.description: The page that contains the Link objects. The first page is 0.

oCoords.description: An array of four numbers in rotated user space, the coordinates of a rectangle listed in the following order: upper-left x, upper-left y, lower-right x and lower-right y .
